extendedInfo.description: FIND YOUR NEAREST LONDON BUS ROUTE MAP* Route Maps appear on most London Bus Stops.* This app lets you find any of the 900 area maps in London, download them and open then in your favourite PDF Reader.* Never lean over anyone at the bus stop again.* No more squinting in the dark reading map.* Download once, files are saved to your sdcard for easy access.This is our first Android app so all ideas, tips and problem report welcome.Email us and we'll get back to you asap.Note Maps are the property of TFL. Our app is merely to help you find the ones for your area and make reading them easier.

reviews.title: Works well
reviews.comment: Is good, but needs to be able to transfer to SD, as phone memory is low (SE Xperia Neo), with just standard apps. Hence only 4*
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Very useful app. Only issue I have found is that it will not download the 5 or 6 \"Night buses: ...\" maps.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: As a driver, hopefully this will prevent me wasting money on taking the wrong bus when I need too.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fantastic app!
reviews.comment: Exactly what I\'ve been looking for. Really simple. Tfl spider maps are the easiest way to make sense of the bus system. Travel heaven!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Does what it says on the tin!
reviews.comment: Great app, simple and does what it says.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent application!
reviews.comment: Works fine. Should name it \'London bus routes map \'. Galaxy s froyo
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: Find your way easily. Though says maps are like 200mb, they really are like 200kb. Little glitch that doesn\'t really affect anything, just should be fix at some point. I\'m sure it\'s put some people off downloading a map.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Shame - could be 5
reviews.comment: Maps not updated since olympics otherwise would have been ideal for my visits to the capital
reviews.author: Mark Ramsay

reviews.title: Good but Could be better
reviews.comment: I think adding the shadow to the bus stop post add unnecessary clutter. The bus stop code or later should be added so that you can easily identify which bus stop you are next to or would like to get. The app should also include searching from one point to another point and let you know which bus or buses will get you there
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great for what it does. Could use many more features
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Very useful during our trip to London. Used WiFi to download needed maps as my US phone had no data access - then had the maps available.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Who are \"City of London Consulting Ltd\"? They sound like a company from a Bond movie.....anyway who cares they finally do what the London Council (or whatever Boris is called) couldn\'t do....provide a useful easily accessible place for PDF bus maps, so thank you.\tWhy is this free? I would happily pay for this
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Rubbish
reviews.comment: Called london bus app. When i try to open a london map it says i have to buy app first. What rubbish is this.
reviews.author: Terry Roberts

reviews.title: Just what I needed
reviews.comment: Excellent app. Download bus map for your area. shows all bus route passing through your chosen area.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Very useful, but is anyone else getting an error trying to download the night bus maps? (Xperia Pro)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nightmare!
reviews.comment: Did not work for me. Maps only partially downloaded. Interface was too limited. Shame as it appeared to be exactly what I needed. :(
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: App is good, I just need to tinkle around with it to truly unleash its greatness.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Simple, clean and ready to use. Downloaded all the maps I\'m likely to need on the old wifi. Job done. Great. (galaxy s2)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: This is great!
reviews.comment: No more walking around under the rain and cold to find a bus map. Thanks!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Download
reviews.comment: Very helpful, but pls download all maps first
reviews.author: A Google User
